content:
Michael Jordan is considered by many to be one of the greatest basketball players of all time, and his greatness is often attributed to a number of factors. Here are a few key reasons why Jordan is considered to be such an exceptional athlete:

1. Skill and athleticism: Jordan was a supremely skilled player with exceptional athleticism, which allowed him to make incredible moves and score points in ways that seemed almost effortless.
2. Competitive drive: Jordan had an intense competitive drive and a desire to win that was unmatched by many of his peers. He was known for his relentless work ethic and his willingness to push himself to be the best.
3. Clutch performances: Jordan was famous for his ability to perform under pressure, and he had a knack for making clutch shots and game-winning plays when it mattered most.
4. Championship success: Jordan won six NBA championships over the course of his career, which is an impressive feat that few other players have matched.
5. Cultural impact: Jordan's impact on basketball and popular culture was enormous, and his success helped to elevate the sport and make it more popular around the world.

Overall, it is the combination of these factors and more that make Jordan such an iconic and beloved figure in the world of sports.
